$:/plugins/abraham/giscus-for-tiddlywiki.text:
!! Version 0.2.1 - February 19, 2023

* Initial implementation supporting setup and non-system tiddler commenting
* Supported by core version >= 5.2.5

$:/plugins/abraham/giscus-for-tiddlywiki.title: $:/plugins/abraham/giscus-for-tiddlywiki-plugin/discussion-category-setting
$:/plugins/abraham/giscus-for-tiddlywiki.caption: Category*
$:/plugins/abraham/giscus-for-tiddlywiki.text:
!!! Discussion Category details

Enter the discussion category id for the Announcements type. 
It is recommended to use a category with the Announcements type so that 
new discussions can only be created by maintainers and giscus.

<$edit-text 
placeholder="Enter discussion category id"
size="50"
tag="input" 
type="text" 
tiddler="$:/config/giscus/discussion-category-id" 
field="text" />

$:/plugins/abraham/giscus-for-tiddlywiki.title: $:/plugins/abraham/giscus-for-tiddlywiki-plugin/features-setting
$:/plugins/abraham/giscus-for-tiddlywiki.caption: Features
$:/plugins/abraham/giscus-for-tiddlywiki.text:
!!! Choose whether specific features should be enabled. <$checkbox tiddler="$:/config/giscus/reactions" field="text" default="1" checked="1" unchecked="0"> Enable reactions for the main post
The reactions for the discussion's main post will be shown before the comments.
<$checkbox tiddler="$:/config/giscus/metadata" field="text" default="0" checked="1" unchecked="0"> Emit discussion metadata
Discussion metadata will be sent periodically to the parent window (the embedding page). For demonstration, enable this option and open your browser's console on this page. See the [[the documentation|https://github.com/giscus/giscus/blob/main/ADVANCED-USAGE.md#imetadatamessage]] for more details.
<$checkbox tiddler="$:/config/giscus/position" field="text" default="bottom" checked="top" unchecked="bottom"> Place the comment box above the comments
The comment input box will be placed above the comments, so that users can leave a comment without scrolling to the bottom of the discussion.
<$checkbox tiddler="$:/config/giscus/loading" field="text" default="lazy" checked="lazy" unchecked=""> Load the comments lazily
Loading of the comments will be deferred until the user scrolls near the comments container. This is done by adding `loading="lazy"` to the `

$:/plugins/abraham/giscus-for-tiddlywiki.title: $:/plugins/abraham/giscus-for-tiddlywiki-plugin/page-discussions-mapping-setting
$:/plugins/abraham/giscus-for-tiddlywiki.caption: Discussion mapping
$:/plugins/abraham/giscus-for-tiddlywiki.text:
!!! Discussion mapping <$checkbox tiddler="$:/config/giscus/strict-mapping" field="text" default="1" checked="1" unchecked="0"> Use strict title matching
Avoid mismatches due to ~GitHub's fuzzy searching method when there are multiple discussions with similar titles. See the [[documentation|https://github.com/giscus/giscus/blob/main/ADVANCED-USAGE.md#data-strict]] for more details.

$:/plugins/abraham/giscus-for-tiddlywiki.title: $:/plugins/abraham/giscus-for-tiddlywiki-plugin/readme
$:/plugins/abraham/giscus-for-tiddlywiki.creator: A.B. Samma
$:/plugins/abraham/giscus-for-tiddlywiki.text:
A commenting system for ~TiddlyWiki powered by Github discussions via [[Giscus app|https://giscus.app/]].

__Benefits__

* All the benefits of Github discussions, including:
** Markdown support
** Moderation via github discussions
** Referencing issues
* Self hosting
* Centralizes knowledge management better by integrating in-wiki content and Github discussions

__Requirements__

# A Github account (with the Giscus Github app installed) to authorize read and write privileges to Github discussions
# A ~TiddlyWiki notebook with [[this plugin|$:/plugins/abraham/giscus-for-tiddlywiki-plugin]] installed hosted 
under a repository with Github discussions enabled

Hint: You can drag the above link into your wiki now to install the plugin.

$:/plugins/abraham/giscus-for-tiddlywiki.title: $:/plugins/abraham/giscus-for-tiddlywiki-plugin/repository-setting
$:/plugins/abraham/giscus-for-tiddlywiki.caption: Repository*
$:/plugins/abraham/giscus-for-tiddlywiki.text:
!!! Repository Enter the repository giscus will connect to. Make sure that: # The repository is public, otherwise visitors will not be able to view the discussion. # The giscus app for Github is installed at your repository, otherwise visitors will not be able to comment and react. # The Discussions feature is turned on by enabling it for your repository. Repository name: <$edit-text placeholder="e.g. mygithubusername/myrepositoryname" size="50" tag="input" type="text" tiddler="$:/config/giscus/repository" field="text" />
Repository id: <$edit-text placeholder="Enter repository id" size="50" tag="input" type="text" tiddler="$:/config/giscus/repository-id" field="text" />
